page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content:
I get up in the morning at 8 o'clock and put on my uniform. Then I go downstairs for my breakfast of coffee and toast. As I must be in school for 8:55 and school is a 5_10 minute walk, I leave at 8:45. In school there is a certain timetable for each day.
There are 7 classes a day which last 45 minutes each except for the the last class which is 40 minutes. We have a breaktime of 20 minutes and a dinner break of 50 minutes. School ends at 3:25 and I go home and change into my ordinary clothes. I leave the house and walk to my granny's at the Quay where most of my friends live.My friends and I usually go to an amusement arcade where we play video games. At the weekends and during the summer holidays I stay at my granny's house.
